Quetzalcoatl::

"Perhaps the wants destroy... someone" said gloomy Quetzalcoatl "We 
should ask Aerotaur... come we should ask it"

Quetzalcoatl walked where Aerotaur was

> Starstomp: Right. I don't know why these guys keep attacking us. 
There

enough
